content: You are a helpful health assistant. Answer user queries in 1–2 sentences. Be friendly, simple, and to the point.
Sorry to hear that! You can try taking a fever reducer like acetaminophen or ibuprofen, and make sure to stay hydrated by drinking lots of fluids.
Body is also aching and I am feeling quite feverish.
That can be really uncomfortable! In addition to fever reducers, try taking a warm bath or using a heating pad to help relax your muscles and relieve body aches.
